detail_desc: Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Short, wide sleeves with a narrow frill trim at the top, and an elasticated hem. Partly lined.
Cold shoulder blouse in crinkled plumeti chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with embroidery, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a scalloped lace trim.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a scalloped lace trim.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a scalloped lace trim.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a scalloped lace trim.
Round-necked blouse in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the cuffs and hem with wide, embroidered, scallop-edged flounces.
Sleeveless maxi dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Deep V-neck with inset sections at the front, spaghetti straps that cross at the back, a concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar and heart-shaped press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.

Straight-style shirt in airy cotton poplin with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Straight-style shirt in airy cotton poplin with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Straight-style shirt in airy cotton poplin with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Thin jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with press-studs, a chest pocket and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Long-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons down the front. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Long-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons down the front. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lace trim. Lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lace trim. Lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lace trim. Lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Strappy top in microfibre with adjustable shoulder straps and a lace-trimmed V-neck. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a lace trim, low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a lace trim, low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Sleeveless maxi dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck front and back, a bead-embroidered seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined..

Sleeveless dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with beaded embroidery and a frill trim around the neckline. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.

Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a sheen. V-neck, gathered yoke and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a sheen. V-neck, gathered yoke and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Soft faux fur slippers with appliqués and embroidery on the front, elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey body with a shaped V-neck with side support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top and a lined gusset.
Jersey body with a shaped V-neck with side support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top and a lined gusset.

Pyjamas in soft, jacquard-weave viscose. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with decorative piping. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with slits at the hems.
Calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in viscose jersey with short sleeves, a double-layered top, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
Short, jacquard-weave skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short, jacquard-weave skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short wrap dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Short wrap dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Short skirt in stretch viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, a gathered seam centre front at the top and a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with an underwired sweetheart neckline, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with an underwired sweetheart neckline, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and wide drawstring sides. High cut with gathered seams at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with an open back. Narrow cut at the top with long ties that can be fastened in various ways at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with belt loops at the back, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back and straight wide legs. Satin lining at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in checked twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Ankle-length trousers in checked twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.

Ballet pumps in glittery fabric with embroidery and appliqués at the front, an elasticated strap containing glittery threads over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short jacket in soft, supple suede with contrasting colour seams, peak lapels and buttons down the front. Discreet side pockets, a pleat at the back and buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Short, wide coat in faux fur with a sheep wool texture. Large hood, large buttons down the front, pockets in the side seams and one inner pocket. Satin lining.
Dress in a spotted silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck and flounces at the front. Narrow adjustable grosgrain shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with contrasting colour seams, peak lapels, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves. Side pockets, a detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Short dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Lace section with buttons at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Lace section with buttons at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Boots with lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Boots with lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Jacket in a jacquard weave with a sheen. Peak lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Coat in felted wool containing some cashmere. High stand-up collar with concealed press-studs, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front and buttons at the shoulders.
Two-strand bracelet made of different designs of metal chain with a decorative round metal disc. Adjustable fastening 19.5-24 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a glitter print on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a glitter print on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
